text: Not the End of the World is a young adult novel by Geraldine McCaughrean. It retells the Biblical story of Noah's Ark. The main character is Noah's thirteen-year-old daughter, Timna. The story is also relayed from the points of view of the animals.Review from The Guardian The novel was first published in 2004 and was the winner of the 2004 Whitbread Children's Book Award.Whitbread Award Winners ==References== Category:2004 British novels Category:British young adult novels Category:Costa Book Award-winning works Category:Novels about Noah's Ark Category:Novels based on the Bible Category:Oxford University Press books Category:Children's novels about animals
title: Not the End of the World (McCaughrean novel)
